casebody.data:
Carlos CASIANO
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 13, 2016

Robert J. McKay, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Lisa Herskowitz, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Carlos Casiano's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 166 Conn.App. 901, 137 A.3d 120 (2016), is denied.
